Member Function Documentation

EventLoop* ev::EventHandler::event_loop ( ) const
inline

Returns a pointer to the element's event loop.

If the element isn't running in an event loop, this method will return 0.

virtual EventHandler* ev::EventHandler::handle_event ( const Event &  event)
virtual

This method is called on the current Element when an event (e.g., Element::ENTER, Element::UPDATE, Element::TOP_PRESS) happens.

Parameters
eventThe event to execute
Returns
For transitions, the new element is returned; otherwise this
